thread.title: Check out the 11 best - and worst - dressed celebrities at the MTV Europe Music Awards
thread.title_full: Check out the 11 best - and worst - dressed celebrities at the MTV Europe Music Awards

title: Check out the 11 best - and worst - dressed celebrities at the MTV Europe Music Awards
text:
Check out the 11 best - and worst - dressed celebrities at the MTV Europe Music Awards Check out the 11 best - and worst - dressed celebrities at the MTV Europe Music Awards 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
Stars of the music business strutted their stuff on the red carpet at the MTV Europe Music Awards in Milan. Red and black were the big statement colours – but some of the outfits had better things to say than others. 
Here are 11 of the best and the worst dressed: 1. Worst – Justin Bieber Justin Bieber at the MTV EMA Awards (Yui Mok/PA) 
Red is a great colour, there’s no denying it – but it’s also the colour for “stop”, as in –“stop with the head-to-ankle colour coordination, please, Justin”. 2. Best – Jason Derulo Jason Derulo and guests at the MTV EMA Awards (Yui Mok/PA) 
It may have been dark outside, but Jason unapologetically kept his shades on – along with a stylish fur-collar jacket. 3. Worst – Ellie Goulding Ellie Goulding at the MTV EMA Awards (Antonio Calanni/AP) 
Ellie just looked really awkward and uncomfortable in this dress, and we’re not super-keen on the new hairdo either. 4. Best – Jess Glynne Jess Glynne at the MTV EMA Awards (Yui Mok/PA) 
Okay, after what we said about Justin’s outfit, we have to admit – head-to-toe red can really work, if you get it right. 5. Worst – Mark Ronson and Josephine de la Baume Mark Ronson and Josephine de la Baume at the MTV EMA Awards (Antonio Calanni/AP) 
A matching shiny black satin dress and suit? Couple-dressing at its worst. 6. Best – Eric Nally, Macklemore and Ryan Lewis Eric Nally, Macklemore and Ryan Lewis at the MTV EMA Awards (Yui Mok/PA) 
Top marks really go to Macklemore, with a classic grey woollen overcoat. 7. Worst – Ruby Rose Ruby Rose at the MTV EMA Awards (Yui Mok/PA) 
Flattering in some parts and not-so-much in others, this red carpet look for the co-host just didn’t quite work. 8. Best – Talia Storm Talia Storm at the MTV EMA Awards (Yui Mok/PA) 
It’s hard to pull off Jedward-style hair, but this who look was so weird it was actually wonderful. 9. Worst – Martin Garrix Martin Garrix at the MTV EMA Awards (Yui Mok/PA) 
We’re not sure if the electronic music star arrived on a motorbike and just didn’t have time to change? 10. Best – Laura Whitmore Laura Whitmore at the MTV EMA Awards (Yui Mok/PA) 
The TV presenter really pulled off this long-sleeved mini-dress – which was set off with bright blue shoes. 11. Neutral – Ed Sheeran Ed Sheeran at the MTV EMA Awards (Yui Mok/PA) Share article 
This is so inoffensive it’s hard to call Ed one of the best-dressed, but he was still looking fairly smart. Good one Ed. Promoted Stories
